DataElement.preferredName: Person Therapeutic Procedure Initiation Prior To Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for any questions related to the administration of therapeutic agents before dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Therapeutic Procedure Initiation Prior To Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human being.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredName: Initiation Prior To Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.:Earlier in time or order.:Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient initiated treatme
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient initiated treatment with bisphosphonates less than 30 days prior to the first administration of MLN0128 (TAK-228)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior prednisone or requires the concurrent use of prednisone was dose up to 5mg bid or equivalent for symptom control. And the treatment was initiated prior to commencing the trial medication with evidence of progression on the dose of steroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received prior prednisone or requires the concurrent use of prednisone was dose up to 5mg bid or equivalent for symptom control. And the treatment was initiated prior to commencing the trial medication with evidence of progression on the dose of steroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with an EGFR TKI (i.e. erlotinib, gefitinib or afatinib) within 8 days or approximately 5x half-lives, whichever is longer, of the first dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is currently on prednisone or other corticosteroids for palliation, is the dose less than or equal to 10mg a day or its equivalent dose and it must have been started at least 4 weeks prior to cycle 1 day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received anti-cancer treatment drug within 21 days or 5 half-lives (whichever is shorter) prior to the first dose of AZD1775?
